name: Horadric Forging
description: Adds new Horadric Cube recipes that allow rerolling items in various ways.
author: olegbl

config.name: Allow Reforging
config.description: Cube an item with a Dol Rune to convert it into a normal quality item. A normal item item will become high quality.

config.name: Free Reforging
config.description: Do not consume the rune when reforging.

config.name: Allow Rerolling
config.description: Cube an item with an Um Rune to reroll it with random stats (preserving the same quality).

config.name: Free Rerolling
config.description: Do not consume the rune when rerolling.

config.name: Allow Releveling
config.description: Cube an item with a Fal/Lem/Pul Rune to change its item level to 25/40/99 respectively. Warning: unfortunately, this will also reroll the item.

config.name: Free Releveling
config.description: Do not consume the rune when releveling.
